job.title: Dev Ops Engineer
job.description:
As an engineer in the System Firmware and Diagnostics Team, you will be part of a team building hardware-on-demand infrastructure and tools for use by developers across Apple. We build a product that enables remote development, control and testing of new hardware. We also develop tools for enhancing developer workflows, and automation pipelines for product development.
At least 5+ years hands-on experience in Continuous Integration and/or infrastructure engineering/DevOps
Excellent Python/ bash, and scripting fundamentals
Experience with cloud platforms such as AWS, GCE, Azure, or similar
Experience with infrastructure-as-code tools such as Ansible, Chef, Terraform, or CloudFormation
Experience with containerization and cluster management technologies like Docker and Kubernetes
Knowledge of build/release processes and CI/CD systems such as Jenkins
Great To Haves:
Experience working in an agile software development lifecycle
Experience with physical hardware lifecycle projects.Â (Proto, EVT, DVT, and PVT)
Experience working within lab environments
Experience managing external vendors is a huge plus.
Experience with Git
Experience with languages, tools, and frameworks for embedded systems and embedded systems testing is great to have (Make, gcc or clang tool chain, cunit, google test, clang static analysis, cppcheck, gcov, etc.)
Working on core technologies you'll have the opportunity to make a major impact in the way that Apple develops, tests and manufactures all of its products. Our environment fosters product innovation, rapid product iteration and a liberating amount of autonomy.
B.S. or higher in Computer Science, Computer Engineering or equivalent experience
